journey.title: JOURNEY
journey.description: When you choose Soul Li Tude, you're choosing a trusted partner on your spiritual journey. Here's what sets us apart:

items.question: What is Astrology?
items.answer: Astrology is the study of how the positions of celestial bodies influence human life and behavior.

items.question: What are the key principles of Astrology?
items.answer: Astrology is based on zodiac signs, planets, houses, and aspects, which together form a birth chart that reflects one's personality and life path.

items.question: How can I book a slot?
items.answer: You can easily book a session online by selecting a service and choosing your preferred date and time.

items.question: Where are you located?
items.answer: We're located in Chennai, and offer consultations both in-person and online worldwide.

items.question: Why do we use it?
items.answer: Astrology offers insights into personality, relationships, and life choices, helping you understand yourself better.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality and Trust
confidentiality.description: We understand the personal nature of astrology consultations. Rest assured that your information will be treated with the utmost confidentiality and respect.

professionalism.title: Professionalism and Expertise
professionalism.description: Our astrologer brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to each session, ensuring accurate and valuable insights.

spiritualConnection.title: Spiritual Connection
spiritualConnection.description: Our astrologer combines astrology's analytical approach with a deep spiritual connection, providing guidance that resonates on a soul level.

empowerment.title: Empowerment and Transformation
empowerment.description: Our ultimate goal is to empower you to live a fulfilling and purpose-driven life. We'll guide you to embrace your authentic self and create positive changes.

contact.title: Contact Address
contact.description: You can receive immediate and accurate advice about your life by speaking with an expert Astrologer over the phone or via chat. You can choose an astrologer based on language, expertise in different areas, charges, and years of experience.

disclaimer.title: DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.text: There are no guarantees that every person using this service will get their desired results for sure. Astrological results depend on a lot of factors and the results may vary from person to person.
